columns.name: CONTAINER_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the container group.

columns.name: CONTAINER_GROUP_XID
columns.description: The XID for the container group.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: Identifies the consol shipment to which the container group is assigned.

columns.name: UNITIZATION_REQUEST_TYPE
columns.description: The unitization request type for this container group that can accept orders with the same unitization request flag and the same stuffing and destuffing location.

columns.name: CONTAINER_RELEASE_NUMBER
columns.description: The container release number is assigned once a sea carrier receives a new booking line item. They return the container release number (CRN) corresponding to the new booking.

columns.name: STUFF_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location where the contents will be loaded (stuffed) into the container.

columns.name: DESTUFF_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location where the contents will be unloaded (destuffed) from the container.

columns.name: REFERENCE_CODE
columns.description: This field is populated with the reference code that was entered on the unitization rule that was used to create this container.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
